programme.desc: Sebuah filem seram komedi lakonan Osman Kering, Rosli Rahman Adam, Fetty Dzul dan Emma Akma

programme.title: The Invoking 2
programme.desc: Walaupun beratus-ratus peristiwa paranormal yang mengganggu berlaku setiap tahun, kebanyakan pertemuan mengerikan ini tidak dilaporkan - sehingga kini. Bersaksilah ketika mangsa malang mengalami ketakutan yang tidak terkata apabila berhadapan dengan kuasa syaitan, poltergeist pembunuh dan entiti jahat lain yang mati bersedia untuk menuntut jiwa mereka . Turun ke jurang mimpi buruk yang terjaga ketika roh-roh jahat yang dahagakan darah ini berusaha untuk memiliki mangsa mereka dan menyeret mereka-menendang dan menjerit-turun ke neraka.

programme.title: Janin Tak Berdosa
programme.desc: Pasangan suami isteri muda Firman dan Julia merancang berbulan madu di Amsterdam selepas Firman mendapat kenaikan pangkat di syarikatnya. Oleh kerana pada masa itu Julia mengandung dan beliau ingin meneruskan percutiannya maka mereka merancang menggugurkan kandungan itu.

programme.title: The Unlit
programme.desc: Apabila Claire kembali ke kampung halamannya, dia menemui bekas rumahnya diterpa dengan sihir yang menakutkan, dan desa tersebut tenggelam dalam ketakutan, kemerosotan, dan kegilaan.

programme.title: War Path
programme.desc: Seorang pembunuh kontrak menerima pekerjaan berbahaya yang tidak betul, meletakkan nyawa isterinya dalam bahaya.

programme.title: Mat Moto
programme.desc: Empat sekawan yang gemar akan motosikal menjelajah Malaysia sambil menerokai erti sebenar persahabatan.

programme.title: Jin Notti
programme.desc: Segala yang berlaku dalam dunia jin akan bertentangan dengan alam manusia. Notti, seekor anak jin dihukum kerana sering membuat keburukan dalam dunianya. Hukuman yang dijatuhkan kepadanya ialah dia perlu turun ke bumi dan untuk bergaul dengan orang-orang jahat. Ketika berada di bumi, Notti perlu masuk ke dalam tubuh manusia dan membuat kejahatan namun dia sering gagal. Lebih merumitkan keadaan, Notti mula jatuh cinta dengan seorang lelaki bernama Aziz.

programme.title: Ular
programme.desc: Myra ialah seorang wartawan jenayah yang digantung kerja telah diarahkan untuk membuat liputan di sebuah pusat peranginan di sebuah pulau. Dia yang ditemani jurukameranya, Remy tidak pernah menyangka tugasannya kali ini bukanlah satu tugasan biasa apabila percutian hebat yang dimenangi oleh 10 orang pemenang cabutan bertuah bertukar menjadi sebuah mimpi ngeri. Segalanya bermula apabila ada di antara tetamu pusat peranginan itu dengan beraninya telah menyelinap masuk ke dalam hutan yang telah dipagari dengan pagar elektrik. Rambo yang panik setelah menyedari hal tersebut segera mendapatkan Encik Aziz, pemilik pusat peranginan tersebut. Ia secara tidak langsung telah menimbulkan rasa ingin tahu Myra dan Remy untuk merungkai apakah rahsia yang cuba disembunyikan oleh Encik Aziz di sebalik kewujudan pusat peranginan tersebut.

programme.title: Anita Dunia Ajaib
programme.desc: Rumahtangga Amir dan Asmah berubah setelah mereka didatangi seorang pembantu rumah misteri yang membantu mendapatkan mereka cahaya mata. Selepas melahirkan anak dalam tempoh yang singkat, satu demi satu insiden aneh menimpa ahli keluarga dan kenalan mereka.

programme.title: Puaka Balai Gombak
programme.desc: Sekumpulan anak muda yang menggelarkan diri mereka Puaka X gemar pergi ke beberapa tempat yang dikatakan berhantu. Mereka menggunakan pendekatan berbeza daripada kumpulan paranormal yang lain. Semakin hari, Puaka X semakin galak mencabar sesiapa di luar sana untuk membuktikan kewujudan hantu. Pada suatu hari mereka menerima cabaran daripada seseorang yang tidak dikenali untuk pergi ke lokasi bernama Balai Gombak. Tanpa disedari, ada sesuatu yang menanti mereka di sana.

programme.title: Duhai Si Pari Pari
programme.desc: Mengisahkan Syadon, seorang pemuda yang mencintai Mala. Pada suatu hari, Syadon bertemu seorang gadis bernama Pari yang sedang mencari kekasihnya. Semakin hari, Pari semakin suntuk waktu yang Pari ada untuk mengahwini jejaka idamannya dan pulang ke dunia kayangan. Syadon bertanya siapakah Pari yang sebenarnya dan setelah diterangkan, dia sukar mempercayainya. Pari terpaksa membuktikan kata-katanya dengan menunaikan permintaan Syadon.

programme.title: Anak Niat
programme.desc: Juita dipanggil anak niat yang ditatah penuh kasih sayang oleh ibu dan bapanya, Orang Kaya dan Faridah. Ibu dan bapa Juita bernazar kepada Keramat untuk mendapatkan seorang anak iaitu Juita namun tidak mahu menerima kenyataan bahawa perbuatan itu adalah syirik. Juita kemudian menjalinkan hubungan bersama Jidot. Abang Mat pula sedih kerana sering dipandang hina oleh Orang Kaya dan Juita hanya kerana dia seorang pembantu yang diupah oleh mereka. Kebenaran terbongkar apabila Abang Mat ialah bapa kepada Jidot dan juga Juita.

programme.title: Jin Notti
programme.desc: Segala yang berlaku dalam dunia jin akan bertentangan dengan alam manusia. Notti, seekor anak jin dihukum kerana sering membuat keburukan dalam dunianya. Hukuman yang dijatuhkan kepadanya ialah dia perlu turun ke bumi dan untuk bergaul dengan orang-orang jahat. Ketika berada di bumi, Notti perlu masuk ke dalam tubuh manusia dan membuat kejahatan namun dia sering gagal. Lebih merumitkan keadaan, Notti mula jatuh cinta dengan seorang lelaki bernama Aziz.

programme.title: Seru
programme.desc: Mengisahkan tentang sebuah produksi yang sedang membuat satu penggambaran filem seram bertajuk "Jangan Bernafas". Semasa penggambaran berlangsung, secara tiba-tiba, pelbagai kejadian aneh dan peristiwa berlaku, diluar jangkaan mereka. Pada mulanya, mereka menganggap ia hanyalah rasukan biasa dan kru di sebalik pembikinan filem tersebut, ingin menjadikannya sebagai "footage" menarik untuk tujuan promosi filem tersebut. Namun, seorang demi seorang menjadi sasaran rasukan dan juga pembunuhan, menyebabkan keadaan menjadi tidak terkawal... tetapi kamera yang digunakan, masih terus merakamkan aksi yang terjadi.

programme.title: Brainscan: Aku Dan Topi Ajaib
programme.desc: Adruce, seorang budak yang kuat berangan dan sering tidur dalam kelas. Pada suatu hari, Adruce membawa pulang sebuah alat berbentuk topi yang dijumpainya di dalam semak. Tanpa pengetahun Adruce, alat itu adalah sebuah mesin yang boleh membaca fikiran manusia yang dicuri daripada makmal Dr. Suzana. Pelbagai kejadian berlaku selepas Adruce memakai topi itu sehingga dia perlu membetulkan semula keadaan yang telah berubah.

programme.title: Perjanjian Syaitan
programme.desc: Tambun membunuh Tok Kadim, penghulu di sebuah kampung dan kemudiannya mengatakan bahawa Tok Kadim mati satu kemalangan. Selepas kejadian itu, Tambun dilantik menjadi ketua kampung yang baharu. Pada masa yang sama, Ribut, adik kepada Tambun yang berwajah hodoh ingin membalas dendam kepada Ujang kerana menolak cintanya dan memilih Seri sebagai teman. Ribut bersahabat dengan syaitan yang berjanji untuk menjadikannya seorang perempuan cantik. Sejak itulah Ribut berusaha untuk membalas dendam sehingga berlaku beberapa siri kematian yang penuh misteri.

programme.title: Magika
programme.desc: Mengisahkan dua beradik, Ayu dan Malik yang tersesat di alam bunian selepas keluar rumah pada waktu maghrib. Ayu berhadapan dengan ujian sukar untuk menyelamatkan adiknya Malik yang diculik nenek kebayan. Walau bagaimanapun, Ayu bernasib baik kerana dia bertemu dengan Badang yang membantu menyelamatkan mereka keluar dari dunia asing itu.

programme.title: 2 Alam
programme.desc: Amy(Adam) melanjutkan pengajiannya di London. Semasa berada di sana, dia terpengaruh dengan budaya barat. Dia sanggup membuat pembedahan menukar jantina dan berkahwin dengan seorang lelaki Inggeris. Sekian lama membuat dosa, Amy(Adam) akhirnya nekad untuk mengambil nyawanya sendiri. Perjalanan terakhir Adam menuju liang lahad menjadi sukar dengan kejadian pelbagai peristiwa aneh.

programme.title: Pontianak Menjerit
programme.desc: Selepas kematian Datuk Pangeran Abdul Rahman, waris-warisnya dipanggil untuk mendengar wasiat yang ditulisnya. Harta peninggalannya sebanyak RM30 juta akan dibahagikan kepada Azlee, Mazlan, Saiful serta isteri mudanya, Ratana Putri, seorang wanita Thailand. Azlee tidak puas hati sebab tak mahu berkongsi harta dengan pewaris lain. Lalu berlakulah pertengkaran kecil antara Azlee, Saiful dan Ratana Puri. Peguam arwah Datuk Pangeran menjelaskan terdapat syarat untuk memiliki harta tersebut, iaitu kesemua waris-waris diminta untuk menetap di banglo besar itu selama 33 hari. Dalam ketegangan yangg berlaku diantara Azlee, Saiful dan Ratana Putri, tiba-tiba mereka dikejutkan dengan kehadiran pontianak di banglo tersebut.

programme.title: Seru
programme.desc: Mengisahkan tentang sebuah produksi yang sedang membuat satu penggambaran filem seram bertajuk "Jangan Bernafas". Semasa penggambaran berlangsung, secara tiba-tiba, pelbagai kejadian aneh dan peristiwa berlaku, diluar jangkaan mereka. Pada mulanya, mereka menganggap ia hanyalah rasukan biasa dan kru di sebalik pembikinan filem tersebut, ingin menjadikannya sebagai "footage" menarik untuk tujuan promosi filem tersebut. Namun, seorang demi seorang menjadi sasaran rasukan dan juga pembunuhan, menyebabkan keadaan menjadi tidak terkawal... tetapi kamera yang digunakan, masih terus merakamkan aksi yang terjadi.

programme.title: Brainscan: Aku Dan Topi Ajaib
programme.desc: Adruce, seorang budak yang kuat berangan dan sering tidur dalam kelas. Pada suatu hari, Adruce membawa pulang sebuah alat berbentuk topi yang dijumpainya di dalam semak. Tanpa pengetahun Adruce, alat itu adalah sebuah mesin yang boleh membaca fikiran manusia yang dicuri daripada makmal Dr. Suzana. Pelbagai kejadian berlaku selepas Adruce memakai topi itu sehingga dia perlu membetulkan semula keadaan yang telah berubah.

programme.title: Perjanjian Syaitan
programme.desc: Tambun membunuh Tok Kadim, penghulu di sebuah kampung dan kemudiannya mengatakan bahawa Tok Kadim mati satu kemalangan. Selepas kejadian itu, Tambun dilantik menjadi ketua kampung yang baharu. Pada masa yang sama, Ribut, adik kepada Tambun yang berwajah hodoh ingin membalas dendam kepada Ujang kerana menolak cintanya dan memilih Seri sebagai teman. Ribut bersahabat dengan syaitan yang berjanji untuk menjadikannya seorang perempuan cantik. Sejak itulah Ribut berusaha untuk membalas dendam sehingga berlaku beberapa siri kematian yang penuh misteri.

programme.title: Magika
programme.desc: Mengisahkan dua beradik, Ayu dan Malik yang tersesat di alam bunian selepas keluar rumah pada waktu maghrib. Ayu berhadapan dengan ujian sukar untuk menyelamatkan adiknya Malik yang diculik nenek kebayan. Walau bagaimanapun, Ayu bernasib baik kerana dia bertemu dengan Badang yang membantu menyelamatkan mereka keluar dari dunia asing itu.

programme.title: 2 Alam
programme.desc: Amy(Adam) melanjutkan pengajiannya di London. Semasa berada di sana, dia terpengaruh dengan budaya barat. Dia sanggup membuat pembedahan menukar jantina dan berkahwin dengan seorang lelaki Inggeris. Sekian lama membuat dosa, Amy(Adam) akhirnya nekad untuk mengambil nyawanya sendiri. Perjalanan terakhir Adam menuju liang lahad menjadi sukar dengan kejadian pelbagai peristiwa aneh.

programme.title: Pontianak Menjerit
programme.desc: Selepas kematian Datuk Pangeran Abdul Rahman, waris-warisnya dipanggil untuk mendengar wasiat yang ditulisnya. Harta peninggalannya sebanyak RM30 juta akan dibahagikan kepada Azlee, Mazlan, Saiful serta isteri mudanya, Ratana Putri, seorang wanita Thailand. Azlee tidak puas hati sebab tak mahu berkongsi harta dengan pewaris lain. Lalu berlakulah pertengkaran kecil antara Azlee, Saiful dan Ratana Puri. Peguam arwah Datuk Pangeran menjelaskan terdapat syarat untuk memiliki harta tersebut, iaitu kesemua waris-waris diminta untuk menetap di banglo besar itu selama 33 hari. Dalam ketegangan yangg berlaku diantara Azlee, Saiful dan Ratana Putri, tiba-tiba mereka dikejutkan dengan kehadiran pontianak di banglo tersebut.

programme.title: Puaka Balai Gombak
programme.desc: Sekumpulan anak muda yang menggelarkan diri mereka Puaka X gemar pergi ke beberapa tempat yang dikatakan berhantu. Mereka menggunakan pendekatan berbeza daripada kumpulan paranormal yang lain. Semakin hari, Puaka X semakin galak mencabar sesiapa di luar sana untuk membuktikan kewujudan hantu. Pada suatu hari mereka menerima cabaran daripada seseorang yang tidak dikenali untuk pergi ke lokasi bernama Balai Gombak. Tanpa disedari, ada sesuatu yang menanti mereka di sana.

programme.title: Anak Niat
programme.desc: Juita dipanggil anak niat yang ditatah penuh kasih sayang oleh ibu dan bapanya, Orang Kaya dan Faridah. Ibu dan bapa Juita bernazar kepada Keramat untuk mendapatkan seorang anak iaitu Juita namun tidak mahu menerima kenyataan bahawa perbuatan itu adalah syirik. Juita kemudian menjalinkan hubungan bersama Jidot. Abang Mat pula sedih kerana sering dipandang hina oleh Orang Kaya dan Juita hanya kerana dia seorang pembantu yang diupah oleh mereka. Kebenaran terbongkar apabila Abang Mat ialah bapa kepada Jidot dan juga Juita.

programme.title: Duhai Si Pari Pari
programme.desc: Mengisahkan Syadon, seorang pemuda yang mencintai Mala. Pada suatu hari, Syadon bertemu seorang gadis bernama Pari yang sedang mencari kekasihnya. Semakin hari, Pari semakin suntuk waktu yang Pari ada untuk mengahwini jejaka idamannya dan pulang ke dunia kayangan. Syadon bertanya siapakah Pari yang sebenarnya dan setelah diterangkan, dia sukar mempercayainya. Pari terpaksa membuktikan kata-katanya dengan menunaikan permintaan Syadon.

programme.title: Ular
programme.desc: Myra ialah seorang wartawan jenayah yang digantung kerja telah diarahkan untuk membuat liputan di sebuah pusat peranginan di sebuah pulau. Dia yang ditemani jurukameranya, Remy tidak pernah menyangka tugasannya kali ini bukanlah satu tugasan biasa apabila percutian hebat yang dimenangi oleh 10 orang pemenang cabutan bertuah bertukar menjadi sebuah mimpi ngeri. Segalanya bermula apabila ada di antara tetamu pusat peranginan itu dengan beraninya telah menyelinap masuk ke dalam hutan yang telah dipagari dengan pagar elektrik. Rambo yang panik setelah menyedari hal tersebut segera mendapatkan Encik Aziz, pemilik pusat peranginan tersebut. Ia secara tidak langsung telah menimbulkan rasa ingin tahu Myra dan Remy untuk merungkai apakah rahsia yang cuba disembunyikan oleh Encik Aziz di sebalik kewujudan pusat peranginan tersebut.

programme.title: Jin Notti
programme.desc: Segala yang berlaku dalam dunia jin akan bertentangan dengan alam manusia. Notti, seekor anak jin dihukum kerana sering membuat keburukan dalam dunianya. Hukuman yang dijatuhkan kepadanya ialah dia perlu turun ke bumi dan untuk bergaul dengan orang-orang jahat. Ketika berada di bumi, Notti perlu masuk ke dalam tubuh manusia dan membuat kejahatan namun dia sering gagal. Lebih merumitkan keadaan, Notti mula jatuh cinta dengan seorang lelaki bernama Aziz.

programme.title: Anita Dunia Ajaib
programme.desc: Rumahtangga Amir dan Asmah berubah setelah mereka didatangi seorang pembantu rumah misteri yang membantu mendapatkan mereka cahaya mata. Selepas melahirkan anak dalam tempoh yang singkat, satu demi satu insiden aneh menimpa ahli keluarga dan kenalan mereka.

programme.title: Design Nation Ep13

Namun, diketahui kemudian bahwa Dina sebenarnya bertunangan dengan seorang lelaki yang dipilih oleh ibunya. programme.title: Melukis Senja Ep9
programme.desc: Senja, seorang gadis yang baru sahaja memasuki sekolah barunya. Dia merupakan seorang pemain ice skating yang mahir. Namun, malangnya, suatu hari dia kalah dalam sebuah pertandingan kerana melihat sebuah anak patung Teddy Bear, yang menyebabkan dia trauma. Masa kanak-kanak Senja, di mana adiknya tenggelam dengan anak patung Teddy Bear kesayangannya, telah menyebabkan trauma padanya hingga kini. Senja akhirnya dibawa ke pakar psikiatri.

programme.title: The Sultan Empire Ep14
programme.desc: The Sultan Empire merupakan bentuk baharu Sultan, iaitu sebuah rancangan komedi sketsa bertemakan kerajaan yang dipenuhi dengan bintang jemputan.

programme.title: Emang Boleh Punya Senyum Selucu Itu
programme.desc: Lili, perempuan simpanan Rio, mengandung dan bertemu dengan Nisa. Nisa sangat marah dan kecewa pada Rio sehingga hubungan mereka akhirnya putus. Nisa menyembuhkan hatinya yang terluka dengan mendaki gunung bersama Fajar. Wartawan terus mengejar Nisa dan menganggap Fajar sebagai kekasih barunya.

programme.title: Tajwid Cinta Ep170
programme.desc: Dafri baru saja kembali ke Indonesia untuk bertemu dengan Alina dan bertunang. Walau bagaimanapun, pertunangan itu terhalang kerana Nadia tidak suka dengan hubungan Dafri Bersama anak perempuannya, Alina. Nadia dengan sengaja menghantar Dafri untuk belajar di Turki agar Dafri jauh dari anak perempuannya. Selain itu, ayah Dafri meminta Dafri untuk berkahwin dengan Syifa, seorang wanita yang pertama kali Dafri temui. Pada ketika itu, Syifa gagal berkahwin kerana bakal suaminya, Ilham, tiba-tiba menghilangkan diri. Selepas berkahwin dengan Dafri, Syifa dan suaminya tinggal di Jakarta.

programme.title: D'Academy 5 Ep67
programme.desc: D'Academy kini kembali! D'Academy atau DA (singkatan dari Dangdut Academy) ialah pertunjukan bakat muzik dangdut yang pertama dan terbesar. Acara ini telah berjaya membangkitkan fenomena muzik dangdut, dan program ini telah menjadi salah satu pertunjukan pencarian bakat yang paling berjaya di Indonesia. Musim ini merupakan musim kelima dan diadakan buat kali pertama selepas tidak dihadirkan selama lima tahun.

programme.title: Melukis Senja Ep10
programme.desc: Senja, seorang gadis yang baru sahaja memasuki sekolah barunya. Dia merupakan seorang pemain ice skating yang mahir. Namun, malangnya, suatu hari dia kalah dalam sebuah pertandingan kerana melihat sebuah anak patung Teddy Bear, yang menyebabkan dia trauma. Masa kanak-kanak Senja, di mana adiknya tenggelam dengan anak patung Teddy Bear kesayangannya, telah menyebabkan trauma padanya hingga kini. Senja akhirnya dibawa ke pakar psikiatri.

programme.title: Emang Boleh Punya Senyum Selucu Itu
programme.desc: Lili, perempuan simpanan Rio, mengandung dan bertemu dengan Nisa. Nisa sangat marah dan kecewa pada Rio sehingga hubungan mereka akhirnya putus. Nisa menyembuhkan hatinya yang terluka dengan mendaki gunung bersama Fajar. Wartawan terus mengejar Nisa dan menganggap Fajar sebagai kekasih barunya.

programme.title: D'Academy 5 Ep67
programme.desc: D'Academy kini kembali! D'Academy atau DA (singkatan dari Dangdut Academy) ialah pertunjukan bakat muzik dangdut yang pertama dan terbesar. Acara ini telah berjaya membangkitkan fenomena muzik dangdut, dan program ini telah menjadi salah satu pertunjukan pencarian bakat yang paling berjaya di Indonesia. Musim ini merupakan musim kelima dan diadakan buat kali pertama selepas tidak dihadirkan selama lima tahun.

programme.title: Tajwid Cinta Ep170
programme.desc: Dafri baru saja kembali ke Indonesia untuk bertemu dengan Alina dan bertunang. Walau bagaimanapun, pertunangan itu terhalang kerana Nadia tidak suka dengan hubungan Dafri Bersama anak perempuannya, Alina. Nadia dengan sengaja menghantar Dafri untuk belajar di Turki agar Dafri jauh dari anak perempuannya. Selain itu, ayah Dafri meminta Dafri untuk berkahwin dengan Syifa, seorang wanita yang pertama kali Dafri temui. Pada ketika itu, Syifa gagal berkahwin kerana bakal suaminya, Ilham, tiba-tiba menghilangkan diri. Selepas berkahwin dengan Dafri, Syifa dan suaminya tinggal di Jakarta.

programme.title: Konser Ratu Sejagad
programme.desc: Konsert ratu alam semesta! Penampilan istimewa tiga ratu pentas suara emas.

programme.title: D'Academy 5 Ep67
programme.desc: D'Academy kini kembali! D'Academy atau DA (singkatan dari Dangdut Academy) ialah pertunjukan bakat muzik dangdut yang pertama dan terbesar. Acara ini telah berjaya membangkitkan fenomena muzik dangdut, dan program ini telah menjadi salah satu pertunjukan pencarian bakat yang paling berjaya di Indonesia. Musim ini merupakan musim kelima dan diadakan buat kali pertama selepas tidak dihadirkan selama lima tahun.

programme.title: Konser Indosia28est
programme.desc: Sambutan dua malam ulang tahun Indosiar yang ke-28! Konser Indosia28est dan Konser Raya 28 Tahun Indosiar Luar Biasa akan dihoskan oleh lapan idola Indonesia! Menampilkan ratusan artis Indonesia yang luar biasa!

programme.title: Cinta Setelah Cinta Ep84
programme.desc: Starla dan Niko merupakan pasangan yang sempurna. Mereka mempunyai dua orang anak, iaitu Nila dan Daffa. Walaupun begitu, Niko secara rahsia menjalinkan hubungan dengan Ayu, rakan lama Starla dan Niko dari sekolah menengah. Mereka berdua cuba menyembunyikan hubungan tersebut dari siapa pun. Suatu hari, Ilham, suami Ayu, melihat mereka bermesraan di dalam kereta. Niko dan Ayu melarikan diri, Ilham mengejar mereka. Malangnya, mereka bertiga akhirnya terlibat dalam kemalangan.

programme.title: Hidup Lagi Cabe Cabenya Malah Dikasih Sambalado
programme.desc: Dian menjadi seorang pembantu pensyarah di kampus. Namun, Dian terpaksa berurusan dengan seorang pelajar tampan bernama Abi. Pagi itu, Dian dan Abi sedang menunggang motosikal, mengejar satu sama lain untuk cepat sampai ke kampus. Namun, ternyata mereka berdua lewat dan harus digantung selama satu semester. Dari situ, Dian kemudian bekerja separuh masa di restoran keluarga Abi. Namun, Dian berkata, 'Kamu itu dasar Madesu, Masa Depan Suram'.

programme.title: Tajwid Cinta Ep171
programme.desc: Dafri baru saja kembali ke Indonesia untuk bertemu dengan Alina dan bertunang. Walau bagaimanapun, pertunangan itu terhalang kerana Nadia tidak suka dengan hubungan Dafri Bersama anak perempuannya, Alina. Pada ketika itu, Syifa gagal berkahwin kerana bakal suaminya, Ilham, tiba-tiba menghilangkan diri. Selepas berkahwin dengan Dafri, Syifa dan suaminya tinggal di Jakarta.

programme.title: Konser Raya 29 Tahun Indosiar Luar Biasa Malam Puncak Pertama Ep1
programme.desc: Konser Raya 29 Tahun Indosiar Luar Biasa Malam Puncak Pertama adalah konsert besar yang menandakan ulang tahun ke-29 Indosiar, stesen televisyen Indonesia yang terkenal. Acara ini berlangsung selama dua malam. Konsert ini adalah paparan hebat bakat Indonesia, dengan persembahan dari pelbagai artis dari pelbagai genre. Acara ini dianjurkan oleh sembilan hos popular dalam industri hiburan Indonesia. Konsert ini bukan sahaja sambutan perjalanan dan pencapaian Indosiar selama hampir tiga dekad, tetapi juga mempamerkan kepelbagaian dan kekayaan budaya Indonesia.

programme.title: Keajaiban Cinta Ep12
programme.desc: Siri ini diarahkan oleh Gita Asmara dan dibintangi oleh Aliando Syarief, Sitha Marino, dan Erdin Werdrayana. Kisah Keajaiban Cinta berkisar tentang Darwin (lakonan Aliando Syarief) dan Tiana (lakonan Sitha Marino). Mereka menghadapi pertikaian keluarga yang menghalang hubungan mereka. Darwin telah ditinggalkan oleh ayahnya sejak kecil.

programme.title: Birthday
programme.desc: A family struggle to cope with the loss of their son in the Sewol ferry disaster. When his birthday approaches, they reminisce their memories of him.

programme.title: On The Line
programme.desc: Voice phishing victim infiltrates into the organisation's call center to recover the money, yet discovered another large scale scam ahead...

programme.title: Montage
programme.desc: 5 days before the statute of limitations of a 15-year-old kidnapping case expires, a flower is left anonymously at the crime scene. A few days later, a similar kidnapping takes place.

programme.title: Canola
programme.desc: Gye-choon and her lost granddaughter Hye-ji reunited after 12 years, yet Hye-ji's strange behavior raise questions on what happened to her while they were apart.

programme.title: Along With The Gods: The Last 49 Days
programme.desc: The three grim reapers will guide their 49th soul Kim Soo-Hong to the underworld trials. Meanwhile, God of House will recover the grim reapers' memories from 1,000 years ago.

programme.title: Ashfall
programme.desc: When a volcano straddling the ChinaNorth Korea border erupts, earthquakes ensue causing pandemonium in both North and South Korea.

programme.title: The Tiger
programme.desc: While the Kingdom of Korea is under occupation by the Japanese, an old and experienced hunter is challenged by the hunt of the last tiger in the country.

programme.title: Be With You
programme.desc: Before her death, a woman promises her family that she would return on a rainy day, one year later. Miraculously, she reappears before her husband and son but has no memory about her past.

programme.title: The Foul King
programme.desc: A timid bank clerk discovers his talent as a wrestler by ways of cheating that no one had thought of. Yet frustrated to win solely by tricks, he decided to master moves in becoming a real wrestler.

programme.title: Gate
programme.desc: A group of five conspired for one last heist, yet secrets inside the vault are large enough to overthrow the country.

programme.title: The Assassin
programme.desc: Swordsman Lee Nan hides in a village to escape from his enemies. There, he witnessed atrocities and people are desperate for help. The killer buried in his heart finally makes his appearance.

programme.title: Lovers Vanished
programme.desc: Falsely accused of killing his wife and sentenced to life, Soo-In escaped from the prison and fall in love with bar owner Mi-Ya. Yet their love seems destined to lead to heartbreak...

programme.title: Hard Hit
programme.desc: On his way to work with his kids, a man received a mysterious call claiming he's sitting on a bomb that will go off if he gets out of his seat.

programme.title: The Tiger
programme.desc: While the Kingdom of Korea is under occupation by the Japanese, an old and experienced hunter is challenged by the hunt of the last tiger in the country.

programme.desc: A runaway prince meets a slave who bears a strikingly similar appearance to himself. The prince gets mistaken as the slave and the slave is crowned as King.

programme.desc: Depending on the locations of the missions, Jacky Wu, the leader of the home team, invites various celebrities to take on challenges and bring you excitement every week.

programme.title: My Hero, My Daddy (M) Ep1819
programme.desc: A fathers love for his daughters landed Jinfa Huang in battles against other men right within his family, as he found himself in conflict with his sons-in-law. His 3 daughters each possessed a distinct personality but were similarly headstrong and in romantic relationships that caused their fathers brows to crease. Tianlan, his eldest, was in love with Minglu Xu, Jinfas superior who never missed an opportunity to make life difficult for him; Tianhong, his second daughter, was drifting apart from him because of her husband; meanwhile, his youngest girl was challenging the taboo of a campus romance. How would Jinfa emerge victor in this fight to protect the 3 loves of his life?

programme.title: Way to Health (M) Ep291292
programme.desc: This show invites top medical professionals from different fields to answer questions from the audience. Approved by the medical world, this show is an influential, as well as reliable place to understand more about ones health.

programme.title: Have A Nice Dream (M) Ep12
programme.desc: Five young professionals with different life skills, team up for two days and one night trip, leading the audiance to explore the good life of nature and the beauty of the land of Taiwan.

programme.title: Stories In Taiwan (T) Ep1044
programme.desc: In a playful and relaxed style, the host went deep into the corners of various towns and villages in Taiwan, looking for the uniqueness, introduced the special local customs and traditions.

programme.title: Battle Tour (M) Ep55
programme.desc: Brand new concept of a travelogue show! Hosts will be using a different perspectives and knowledge to show you the latest tourist spots to check in!

programme.desc: Depending on the locations of the missions, Jacky Wu, the leader of the home team, invites various celebrities to take on challenges and bring you excitement every week.

programme.title: A Hint of You (M) Ep3940
programme.desc: As the chef and owner of "All One Hundred" stir-fry restaurant, Ching-Yo Xia is determined to recreate the delicious fried rice her father used to make. To achieve this, she hones her culinary skills by learning from Master Chef Zhai-Yu Fu of a high-end teppanyaki restaurant. Despite her resilience and fearlessness in the face of challenges, Ching-Yo somehow manages to turn Culinary Prince Zhai-Yu's graceful life upside down!

programme.desc: <Stylish Man The Chef> is co-hosted by the Golden Bell Awards winner Sam Tseng and Genie Chuo, together with professional chef, James. programme.title: The Tradition Story of Taiwan (T) Ep4888
programme.desc: The Tradition Story of Taiwan presents a series of tales and folktales in Taiwan that have been pass down from one generation to another generation

programme.title: 100% Wife (T) Ep67
programme.desc: Three generations of the Jin family live under one roof. Mrs. Jin-Ke mei-man has two sons, You-Tsai and You-De. You-Tsai abandoned the family many years ago, leaving his wife Siou-Ying to shoulder the huge responsibility of the Jin family business selling fish products at market. Although Siou-Ying was betrayed by You-Tsai, she has still been a dutiful daughter to her mother-in-law, and has single-mindedly raised four children.

programme.title: Hot Door Night (M) Ep1921
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: Hot Door Night (M) Ep2201
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: iWalker (M) Ep13
programme.desc: iWalker is a TV program which introduce food and attractive places to audience. Hosts will travel around the world to introduce the hidden gems & delicious local food in each place.

programme.title: Wolf Pack
programme.desc: The Wolf Pack squad led by Lao Diao, is a foreign-based team that specializes in overseas security jobs. In one of the missions, the squad discovers that a terrorist force is planning to destroy the countrys energy source. Lao Diao is now entrusted with the task of leading his squad to fight back. Can the Wolf Pack save the day?

programme.title: Dad, I'm Sorry
programme.desc: Ba Sang lives in a poor district in Saigon and his son Woan is a Youtuber earning considerable income. Woan wants his father to enjoy retirement, so he is mad at him for being a meddler and making unnecessary sacrifices. This has created conflicts between the two generations and leads to a crisis in the father and son relationship.

programme.title: Death Stranding
programme.desc: To overhaul the underground gambling industry, the police join hands with the gambling association to crack down on illegal casinos. They auction off new casino licenses to regulate the industry, but this results in an upheaval in the gambling world, unveiling the hidden interests and secrets while sparking conflicts between gangs...

programme.title: One and Only
programme.desc: Veteran street dancer Ding Lei, invites passionate street dancer, Chen Shuo to his dance club. Sparks fly when Chen dances with the clubs top dancers. Chen pursues his dream to perform but discovers that Ding has invited him for another reason. As both of them deal with hard times, can they turn the tide on the challenges that they are facing?

programme.title: Ride On
programme.desc: Master Luo, a washed-up stuntman, trains his beloved horse Red Hare to be a stunt horse. Due to his debts though, Red Hare may be taken away by the debtors. Master Luo has no choice but to seek help from his estranged daughter, and the incident ends up becoming a golden opportunity for them to reconcile.

programme.title: Z Storm
programme.desc: ICAC investigator William is on the case of a corrupt policeman but finds all key witnesses killed when he starts to discover some clues. As investigation continues, William uncovers the fraud scheme of an organized corrupt group involving the governments $15 billion Care Fund. He must fight against them to keep Hong Kong corruption free.

programme.title: All U Need is Love
programme.desc: Ten major film companies join forces on a comedy-drama film to raise funds and create jobs for industry workers during the COVID-19 pandemic. This film features an all-star ensemble cast starring for free, with the story revolving around a group of hotel guests placed under quarantine in Hong Kong.

programme.title: 77 Heartwarmings
programme.desc: After breaking up with Adam, Eva focuses on her career but Adam still wants to make up and tries to move her 77 times. Things become more complicated when a Thai movie idol courts Eva. It is at this time that Evas mother becomes very ill, and she considers marriage in order to fulfil her mothers wish. Will Adam succeed in warming Evas heart?

programme.title: Wise Guys Never Die
programme.desc: Nick meets Teddy, a con artiste, when he is sent to prison for embezzlement, and Teddy teaches him all the gambling tricks. After their release, they team up with Teddys lover Lora, to take revenge on Dragon, who framed Teddy for his sentence. Nick though is seduced by Lora and they end up in an affair. Will Nick finally join Teddy in his revenge?

programme.title: Lucky Star 2015
programme.desc: When a talent manager meets a guy whose voice resembles the famous comedian Stephen Chow, things starts to stir up in the show biz. "Lucky Star 2015" is a hilarious comedy starring actors from both Hong Kong and Taiwan, including Eric Tsang, Dada Chan and Wong Cho Lam.

programme.title: Don't Forget I Love You
programme.desc: Lu Yao suffers from amnesia and forgets about everything that happens yesterday when he wakes up the next day. When Lu Yao meets psychotherapist Xing Yue, they fall in love despite knowing they have no future together, and are determined to love each other no matter what happens...

programme.title: The Comeback
programme.desc: Uncle Hua is a retired agent who owns an antique shop on an old street. When the old street is forcibly demolished by the local Green Dragon Gang one day, Uncle Huas hidden identity is accidentally revealed, and he is pursued by a mysterious organization headed by Ah Jie. A fatal duel has just begun!

programme.title: CZ12
programme.desc: Hawk leads a mercenary team to recover the bronze heads of the 12 Chinese zodiac animals, which were looted by foreigners in the 1800s. With a promise of a 10 times bonus by MP Corp if he can recover all of them, Hawk stops at nothing to accomplish the mission.

programme.title: Z Storm
programme.desc: ICAC investigator William is on the case of a corrupt policeman but finds all key witnesses killed when he starts to discover some clues. As investigation continues, William uncovers the fraud scheme of an organized corrupt group involving the governments $15 billion Care Fund. He must fight against them to keep Hong Kong corruption free.

programme.title: Flirting Scholar 2
programme.desc: The movie tells the story of Tang Bo Hu and his three buddies before they become the four great talents in Jiangnan. Tang Bo Hu encounters a beautiful girl when studying in a monastery and they quickly fall in love, but her hidden identity is accidentally unveiled when Tang and friends uncover a conspiracy at the monastery.

programme.title: The White Storm 2: Drug Lords
programme.desc: In this epic action-thriller starring Andy Lau and Louis Koo, the two award-winning best actors star on opposing sides of a drug war. As a bounty of $100 million Hong Kong dollars is made to hunt down the biggest drug dealer in the city, Hong Kong becomes the battleground for the fight between good and evil.

programme.title: The Monkey King
programme.desc: After Goddess Nuwa sacrifices herself to save the mortal world, Monkey King comes into being from one of her crystals. Powerful and uncontrollable, Monkey King challenges the Jade Emperor and causes an uproar in heaven, unwittingly creating an opportunity for the wicked Buffalo Demon King to wage war in heaven.

programme.title: The Monkey King 2
programme.desc: Monkey King is tasked with escorting Monk Tang on his journey to the West to retrieve the scriptures. During the trip, Monk Tang is being targeted by the seductive yet deadly White Bone Spirit, who feeds on the innocents to gain immortality. Monkey King will have to fight the White Bone Spirit in order to save Monk Tang!

programme.title: The Monkey King 3
programme.desc: Monkey King, Pigsy and Sandy escort Monk Tang to retrieve the scriptures and accidentally head into the mysterious Female Kingdom. The Queen falls in love with Monk Tang at first sight, but her advisor orders Monk Tang and his disciples to be executed. As the four attract the appearance of River Spirit, the Female Kingdom is plunged into crisis!

programme.title: Fight Back to School II
programme.desc: Star Chow (Stephen Chow) is an officer in the Royal Hong Kong Police's elite Special Duties Unit (SDU). During a meeting with his senior officer, Inspector Yip (Deanie Ip), Star jokingly suggests he wish to be reassigned to the traffic unit. Star immediately finds himself demoted to Constable engaging in traffic duty on the streets of Hong Kong. After being made the scapegoat for a failed high school terrorist investigation, Star hastily resigns from the police. He decides to enroll at the high school to launch his own private investigation. But Star realises the investigation won't be easy when he discovers that the bumbling, incompetent CID detective Tat (Ng Man Tat) is also undercover at the high school.

programme.title: Ready O/R Knot
programme.desc: Guy and Heidi have been together for five years since they first met in a wedding banquet, but marriage soon becomes a challenge to their relationship. Heidi sees marriage as a testimony of their love, while Guy sees it as doomsday. Can the couple resolve their conflict? Are they ready or not?

programme.title: Fatal Visit
programme.desc: Yanny leaves Hong Kong for San Jose to visit her old friend Ling. Ling and her husband Tang seems to live an ideal and carefree life. However, during her five-day stay, Yanny uncovers the truth behind the faade as she reveals the unspeakable secrets that will propel all three down a fatal path of destruction.

programme.title: Hello Stranger
programme.desc: This is a Thai romantic comedy. The story portrays a young Thai man and woman who meet by coincidence while on vacation in South Korea. They decide to tour the country together while keeping their names a secret from each other. From unwillingly at first, then become best friends and fall in love finally.

programme.title: Flirting Scholar from the Future
programme.desc: Tiger, Lambert and Skinny Pig are massive fans of the movie, Flirting Scholar. One day, Skinny Pig who is an obscure inventor, puts together a movie time machine and accidentally sucks all of them into the movie of Flirting Scholar. The trio head off to Wah mansion to meet the maid Autumn can they find her and can they return to the present?

programme.title: Young and Dangerous: Reloaded
programme.desc: In this remake of Young and Dangerous, Chan Ho Nam and his three buddies of the Hung Hing triad gang strive to fight for their own justice, further expanding their power in the triad and becoming a new legend...

programme.title: Tales from the Occult: Ultimate Malevolence
programme.desc: The final chapter of 'Tales From The Occult', the movie features three short stories about two high school friends, a magician undergoing hypnosis to find her missing friend, and a man finding his way out of a mysterious building. The stories reveal the most terrifying and ugly side of human nature, where life and death are just a thought away!

programme.title: The Silent War
programme.desc: After the Chinese Civil War, 701 Bureau continues to monitor the coded transmissions between rebel forces. When radio frequencies used by the opponent disappear suddenly, Agent Zhang asks Ho, a blind piano tuner with exceptional hearing, to help find the transmission signals. Can Ho find the missing signals and foil a possible assassination plot?

programme.title: Kung Fu Dunk
programme.desc: Shi Jie grew up in a martial arts school and possesses an extraordinary shooting skill. Street hustler Chen Li sees his talent and arranges for him to join a university basketball team. With his kung fu dunking skill, Shi Jie manages to win all college basketball matches, bringing him wealth and also strengthening his relationship with Chen Li.

programme.title: Golden Chicken 2
programme.desc: The sequel is set in 2046 when a 82-year-old Ah Kam stops a heartbroken young man from taking memory loss pills. To help ease his pain, Ah Kam shares her life stories from 2003, one of Hong Kongs toughest year with SARS, including the different people she comes across and the bittersweet romance between herself and her cousin.

programme.title: Trivisa
programme.desc: In the beginning of 1997, Hong Kong's three notorious thieves who have never met one another before appear in the same restaurant. This leads to a rumour that they are joining forces to pull off something big before the Handover, though this is not something that any of them is aware of.

programme.title: Born to Fly
programme.desc: Lei Yu has officially become the new generation of Chinese test pilots after rounds of strict selection. Captain Zhang Ting leads Lei Yu and other pilots to test the latest fighter jets. Lei Yu keeps pushing the limits in each test flight in the hope of coming up with the perfect plane to ensure the safety of the fighter pilots.

programme.title: Beauty And The 7 Beasts
programme.desc: Teddy, once a renowned movie star, is facing a career decline. To make a living, he accepts five disciples to shape them into stars. Teddys career regains momentum after he reunites with his long-lost daughter, but he is also confronted by a rival at the same time. His daughter and disciples decide to help him overcome this difficult situation

programme.title: Deception of the Novelist
programme.desc: This is a sexy thriller adapted from the hit story by the famous internet author, Xxharuki. A self-help book author Xu lives happily with his wife Jeana and their son. However, when a voluptuous and seductive tenant rents their apartment upstairs, Xus life is turned upside down.

programme.title: 7-Man Army
programme.desc: This iconoclastic film retells the legend of seven Chinese patriots, who sacrificed their lives to defend against 20,000 Japanese soldiers and 50 tanks for 5 days, at a strategic key point of the Great Wall known as Pa Tou Lou Tzu.

programme.title: Sunset
programme.desc: Teenage heart-throbs Ching Li and Paul Chin Pei come across like Annette Funicello and Frankie Avalon in the musical Sunset, a musical romp that plays similar to one of Hollywood's famous "Beach Party" movies. A car load of girls meets a car load of boys, and Ching and Paul ultimately fall in love. Yet the film takes an acrid twist and turns out to be more like a Shakespearian tragedy than a beach-babe party.

programme.title: The Deadly Breaking Sword
programme.desc: Warrior Tuan Chang Qing meets courtesan Liu Yin Xi in a small town. Liu pleads Tuan to kill the underworld master Guo Tian Sheng, known as the "Killer Doctor", in order to avenge the death of her fiance. Tuan and gambling addict Xiao Dao breaks into Guo's household, triggering the battle of good against evil.

programme.title: Rear Entrance
programme.desc: Mrs Xu is childless and watches a lonely little girl playing at the rear entrance from afar every day. She warmly nurtures the girl and even adopts her from her uncaring parent. The girl brings happiness to the Xus until her long lost mother appears one day and to make her happy, Mrs Xu reluctantly lets the girl reunite with her mother.

programme.title: The Kid with the Golden Arm
programme.desc: The government hires Yang to escort a cargo of gold to a famine stricken area. The vicious Chi Sha gang, with one of their best fighters, Golden Arm, announce their intention to hijack it by killing one of Yang's employees. As Yang gathers his own team of reputable fighters to protect his cargo, are they strong enough to hold off Golden Arm?

programme.title: Mr Funny - bone
programme.desc: Join Mr Funny bone in a series of comic vignettes as he attempts to win the heart of a dashing lady. Along for the ride is his loyal sidekick Mr Big Potato, a stout fellow who is forever getting into silly mishaps. The pair gets involved in plenty of shenanigans and gags!

programme.title: The Dragon Missile
programme.desc: Sima works for a corrupt lord Qin who is suffering from a deadly disease that only a special herb can cure. Qin sends him on an urgent mission to retrieve it, but the task is made more difficult when Sima has to fight off other martial artists who want to steal the cure away from him. He has to fight with his ultimate weapon, the Dragon Missile!

programme.title: The Shepherd Girl
programme.desc: In this musical drama, Hsiu Hsiu, a beautiful shepherd girl, falls in love with a handsome boatman Ta Lung. However, she cannot afford to marry him because of her fathers towering debt from gambling. To complicate the matter, a rival suitor promises to pay off all her father's debts on one condition: that Hsiu Hsiu marries him...

programme.title: The Tigress Of Shaolin
programme.desc: Sam is being hunted as he discovers that the mayor and the chief of medical bureau are colluding with a drug dealer. He is saved by a fishermen family and works in their friends grocery but the grocery owner is killed when the enemies track Sam down. Sam escapes to Shaolin to learn the cudgel style of kung fu in order to avenge his friends.

programme.title: The Emperor and the Minister
programme.desc: The ingenious imperial scholar Liu Yung always embarrasses Emperor Chien Lung with his quick wit and gift of gab. The emperor purposely sets him up to solve the seemingly unsolvable. However, Liu Yung resolves it easily with wit and style and foils the emperors plot once again.

programme.title: The Singing Killer
programme.desc: Chiang Yi is blackmailed into a jewelry heist by his former boss, who threatens to expose his shady past. Complications arise when he discovers his first love works at the store.

programme.title: Notorious Eight
programme.desc: The young Chen Chi-chin (Liu Yung) loses heavily to experienced gambler Hu Kuan-ten (Lo Lieh). His father loses at cards and dies of shock. Chen appeals to his uncle who summons seven fellow professional gamblers to carry out vengeance. Much more than a gambling film, this is a thrilling melting pot of martial arts stars, extortion, illicit love, poker-face vengeance, and all sorts of edge-of-your-seat gambling duels. Featuring two of the leading action stars of the era, Chen Kuen-tai and Lo Lieh, in a series of intense poker game standoffs. Famed director of the genre, Wong Jing, also has a guest appearance as one of the Notorious Eight.

programme.title: The Land of Many Perfumes
programme.desc: Monk Tang San Zang, Monkey, Pigsy and Sha Wu Jing find themselves in Womanland, where women give birth to baby girls by drinking the magical spring water.

programme.title: Rendezvous With Death
programme.desc: Sun Chung had been recognized as an expert comedy and crime thriller director, but he was to gain even greater acclaim for his soulful, powerful, intelligent, and beautifully-made martial arts epics. This stands alongside The Deadly Breaking Sword and The Kung-fu Instructor as one of his very best. It's not so much the plot - a master swordsman protects a treasure chest on a dangerous journey - that makes this great, but what Sun does with it, inspiring the cast and crew to some of their finest work.

programme.title: The Crimson Palm
programme.desc: A poor student, Lin, is engaged to the daughter of a rich man who despises Lin because of his familys declining status. Lin visits his fiance before he leaves for the imperial examination, but finds a maid lying dead in blood. As Lins bloody handprint is left on the site, he is accused of the murder. How can Justice Bao prove his innocence?

programme.title: Murder Plot
programme.desc: Martial artist Shen Lang is in discussions with kung fu experts from the other six sects to plot the downfall of the traitorous Happy King when his fiance suddenly disrupts them and Shen has to quickly bring her away. As they continue to pursue the Happy King, both Shen and his fiance accidentally fall into a trap set up by the King.

programme.title: The Comedy of Mismatches
programme.desc: Two pairs of lovers got mismatched accidentally. The man disguises as a woman for his sisters wedding ceremony, while his lover disguises as a man to marry another woman. After the marriage mismatches are revealed, the lovers and their families are taken to court, where Prefecture Chief Qiao manages to work out a happy ending.

programme.title: The Condemned
programme.desc: Yang Lin is a righteous hero who helps an unjustly imprisoned swordsman accused of stealing. They break out of prison together, and warn all evil men they know to watch out for a new deadly duo in town.

programme.title: The Monkey Goes West
programme.desc: The story follows Monk Tang San Zangs journey to the West in search of the Buddhist Sutra. On the way, he encounters and takes as disciples, Monkey, Pigsy and Sha Wu Jing.

programme.title: My Rebellious Son
programme.desc: A corrupt official attempts to steal a priceless Buddha statue from a temple to please a group of Westerners. Luckily, Doctor Zhang and his son manage to defeat the Western boxers, the Japanese Kendo opponents and the Western longsword fighters with Chinese kung fu, thus saving the Buddha statue.

programme.title: Scandal
programme.desc: The roguish scamp Zhen and his best friend Chia collects proof of corruption from the officials in this comedy-drama. After a string of blackmailing, they end up in positions of power, but what is to happen next?

programme.title: Village of Tigers
programme.desc: The devilish residents of the Village of Tigers, led by Hu Jiao, plan to kill Lo Hong Shun, otherwise known as the heroic Sword of the Southern Sky. Hu Jiao sees a way to use the righteousness of the honorable Ba family to help him kill the hero Lo by turning them against him. Will good prevail over evil?

programme.title: Beyond the Great Wall
programme.desc: Wang Zhao Jun refuses to bribe the imperial painter, so he draws an ugly portrait of her, preventing her from being selected by the Emperor until they meet in person. The painter ends up in exile and plots for Wang to marry the Huns warlord as a revenge. The Emperor rejects this, provoking a war which is only averted when Wang sacrifices herself.

programme.title: Swordsman at Large
programme.desc: Hsiao Shi Yi Lang is the Swordsman at large who everyone wants to kill. A magnificient sword is even created for this purpose though the blade is soon coveted more than the swordsman's death by it! Bandits, beauties and blade masters battle for survival in this exciting story of deceit, betrayal, and death.

programme.title: Hex
programme.desc: This supernatural mystery tells the story of a sickly wife and her maid conspiring to kill her beastly husband, leading to a string of events with spooky twists and turns.

programme.title: Wits Of The Brats
programme.desc: Tou Kuan is a wealthy Kwangtung brat with a good kung fu background, he has only one ambition: to pit his wits against three shady masters of the North. The first, conman Che Tsai. The second, a professional romantic dubbed The Terrific. Terrific introduces Tou Kuan to his third rival, Thief Shih San-shou.

programme.title: The Singing Thief
programme.desc: A master jewel thief turns over a new leaf as a professional singer in a nightclub. However, a series of robberies happened shortly after and he becomes the suspect again. The thief then sets up a trap to snare the copycat but will this backfire on him?

programme.title: Call of the Sea
programme.desc: A young fisherman, Chin Hu is in love with his childhood friend Hsiao Yu. However, the only son of a town bully lusts after Hsiao Yus beauty and tries all possible ways to approach her. Chin Hu protects another woman from the bully one day, leading Hsiao Yu to misunderstand him and suspect that they are having an affair...

programme.title: Iron Bodyguard
programme.desc: Wang Wu, the head of a security firm Iron Bodyguard, meets a scholar who is a member of the Reformists, a group of scholars pressing for social reform in China at the end of the Qing dynasty. The Emperor actually supports such reforms but not the Empress Dowager. She orders the Reformists to be arrested and Wang Wu gets drawn into the politics.

programme.title: The Pure and the Evil
programme.desc: Two teen girls, Rose and May, become close friends despite their different social backgrounds. The rich girl May moves to America but returns years later to see Rose, now a beauty queen and bar girl. Rose is immediately attracted to Fangs fianc and their relationship quickly deteriorates when Rose sets out to pursue him

programme.title: The Duel
programme.desc: After knowing his brother has killed the head of a rival triad, Jie takes the blame and was hunted by killers. With the help of Rambler Nan, Jie finally killed his enemies, but then found out that Nan is the one who has killed his father.

programme.title: Three Sinners
programme.desc: Based on the classic Ming Dynasty novel The Water Margin, Three Sinners is a Huangmei Opera about love, betrayal, murder, and redemption. Starring Hong Kong's premiere movie couple, it is one of the grandest Eastmancolor-Shawscope costume musicals in the Shaw Brothers library.

programme.title: The Master
programme.desc: Gao Jian is the disciple of the martial arts master Shi but is constantly being punished by his master for no reason. One day, Gao accidentally saves his masters rival Jin, so Jin teaches him his unique martial arts skill in return. However, Master Shi sees this as Gaos betrayal

programme.title: We Love Millionaires
programme.desc: In this romantic comedy, three beautiful Hong Kong salesgirls travel to Osaka in Japan to pursue their dreams of marrying a rich man. They masquerade as high society debutantes and make their way to a posh resort to meet and woo millionaires (or fake ones!).

programme.title: Shaolin Prince
programme.desc: As the names of Chang Cheh and Liu Chia-liang became legendary, all-too-often the name of their equally valued collaborator, Tang Chia, is omitted. That may be, because, unlike the previous pair, the veteran kung-fu choreographer only went on to direct three movies of his own. Of course, that makes this trio all the more special, and this first effort perhaps the most special of all. It may be an eye-filling, mind-bending martial arts tale of two royal princes battling for the rightful recovery of the throne, but it's also a party, where Tang invites two cinematographers, three editors, and no less than five other choreographer friends to almost literally shoot the works. The results are kung-fu configurations not only never seen before, but never even imagined!

programme.desc: Rachel and Phoebe go out for a night together. Chandler returns to New York to visit Monica.

programme.title: Friends S9 10
programme.desc: Chandler must remain in Tulsa during Christmastime because of a big deadline at work.

programme.title: Friends S9 11
programme.desc: Their immediate war of wills prompts Rachel to make a rash decision that she could regret. Having quit his job, Chandler must get another fast.

programme.title: Friends S9 12
programme.desc: Rachel is irritated to learn that her handsome new workplace rival, Gavin, has been invited to her birthday party.

programme.title: Wahl Street S1 3
programme.desc: Despite emerging prospects in many of his enterprises, Mark grapples with running both large and small businesses amid a global pandemic.

programme.title: Wahl Street S1 4
programme.desc: As the pandemic forces a global lockdown, Mark pushes through his own fears and checks in with his business partners to promote employee health and wellness.

programme.title: Wahl Street S1 5
programme.desc: With the future of their companies hanging in the balance, Mark and his business partners tackle tough decisions. Later, Mark's new business advisor challenges a potential future endeavor.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S12 24
programme.desc: It's an end and a beginning in part 2 of the series finale, as Penny & Leonard try to keep a secret, Raj makes a new friend, and the gang travels together into an uncharted future.

programme.title: Young Sheldon S5 16
programme.desc: When Meemaws gambling room is a success, she finds herself with a suitcase of illegal cash. Meanwhile, Missy starts a business and Sheldon dips his toe in the stock market.

programme.title: Young Sheldon S5 17
programme.desc: In the 100th episode, Sheldon gets an odd request from an old friend, while George and Mary are caught in the middle of Meemaw and Dales breakup, and Georgie comes clean to Mandy.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S3 1
programme.desc: Sheldon flees back to Texas in disgrace when he learns that the guys tampered with his arctic expedition data -- threatening Leonard's hopes for a romantic encounter with Penny.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S3 2
programme.desc: Leonard and Penny struggle to recover from an awkward first hookup, while Sheldon and Howard (SIMON HELBERG) stake their best comic books on a bet to determine an insect species.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S3 3
programme.desc: Howard and Raj (series star KUNAL NAYYAR) visit a Goth nightclub to pick up women, while Sheldon attempts to build a better Penny using chocolate-based behavior modification.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S3 4
programme.desc: Raj must find a new job or be sent back to India. Sheldon, however, has a solution -- which leaves Leonard and Penny dealing with Howard as third wheel.

programme.title: Hack My Life S4 6
programme.desc: Kevin reveals a gas mask hack that will help you during a zombie apocalypse.

programme.title: Jumper
programme.desc: The epic adventures of David Rice, a young man who discovers he possesses the exhilarating ability to instantly teleport anywhere in the world.

programme.title: Father Figures
programme.desc: Upon learning that their mother has been lying to them for years about their allegedly deceased father, fraternal twin brothers Kyle and Peter resolve to find the mystery man in what results in a wild road trip of discovery and revelations.

programme.title: Fall
programme.desc: For Becky and Hunter, life is all about conquering fears and pushing limits. After climbing 2,000 feet to the top of a remote, abandoned radio tower, they find themselves stranded with no way down.

programme.title: Young Sheldon S5 18
programme.desc: While Sheldon copes with the death of a hero, Georgie struggles with his big secret and Missy wants to babysit.

programme.title: Young Sheldon S5 19
programme.desc: George and Mary insist on meeting the new woman in Georgies life, while Sheldon and Missy have suspicions about whats going on with their family.

programme.title: Young Sheldon S5 20
programme.desc: Despite the whole family trying to keep it a secret, Sheldon and Missy learn about Georgies pregnancy.

programme.title: Major Crimes S4 01
programme.desc: In the season premiere, Major Crimes investigates a double homicide in the Hollywood Hills. Meanwhile, Sanchez attempts to reintegrate himself in the division after his suspension.

programme.title: Major Crimes S4 02
programme.desc: When a dead body pops out of the trunk after a car chase, Major Crimes must the untangle connections between many different people and professions. PAUL SCHULTZE guest stars.

programme.title: Major Crimes S4 03
programme.desc: Major Crimes investigates the murder of a supermodel with close ties to a pompous celebrity photographer (JAMIE BAMBER). Raydor and Rusty are both served subpoenas.

programme.title: Major Crimes S4 04
programme.desc: In his first outing as a Reserve Officer, Buzz finds a dead body in a hotel room, threatening, among other things, Flynn and Provenza's plans to take the squad to a baseball game.

programme.title: Major Crimes S4 05
programme.desc: As the Major Crimes unit investigates a complicated gangland shooting, Detective Amy Sykes finds she must protect the identity of a witness capable of identifying the killer.

programme.title: Masterchef USA S14 Ep03
programme.desc: Gen Z Auditions - 10 aprons have been handed out with another five up for grabs for the most deserving Gen Z amateur home cooks. Former MasterChef finalist and Gen Z internet sensation Nick DiGiovanni is the guest judge.

programme.title: Sullivan's Crossing S1 Ep06
programme.desc: Boiling Point - Sully tries to hold things together at Sullivan's Crossing, while Maggie attempts to navigate complications back in Boston, Massachusetts.

programme.title: Survivor S46 Ep06
programme.desc: Cancel Christmas - Drop your buffs! Castaways hit the ground running to figure out where the cracks are within the other tribes. The players hope to find new life in the game if they can earn the merge.

programme.title: The Goldbergs S2 Ep06
programme.desc: Big Baby Ball - When Adam is hurt during a game of dodgeball, Beverly retaliates by getting his P.E. teacher fired. Erica dethrones Barry as board game champion when they play a new game called Trivial Pursuit.

programme.title: Masterchef USA Junior S9 Ep01
programme.desc: Eating Emoji - Joining Gordon Ramsay, Aaron Sanchez and Daphne Oz to judge the 12 best junior cooks, is Tilly Ramsay! In this first challenge, each young cook will have to create a dish based on an emoji.

programme.title: Top Chef S21 Ep13
programme.desc: Set Sail - The final four chefs arrive in Curaao for their last challenge. The chefs set sail where they enjoy a meal prepared by chef and Fresh Fish Ambassador Morimoto.

programme.title: Sullivan's Crossing S1 Ep07
programme.desc: Second Chances - After receiving some unfortunate news, Maggie returns to Sullivan's Crossing with Andrew, where Sully tries to put things right. Maggie attempts to share her love for the Crossing with a reluctant Andrew.

programme.title: Spider-Man: Far From Home
programme.desc: Our friendly neighborhood Super Hero decides to join his best friends Ned, MJ, and the rest of the gang on a European vacation. However, Peters plan to leave super heroics behind for a few weeks are quickly scrapped when he begrudgingly agrees to help Nick Fury uncover the mystery of several elemental creature attacks, creating havoc across the continent!

programme.desc: Discover why potatoes go on a wild hydraulic ride to become crunchy chips; how machines and human hands have to perfectly co-exist to make the South Asian dessert fav gulab jamun; how 6 million eggs can make 75 million delectable almond biscotti.

programme.desc: Discover why peanuts enjoy a good tumble and hot oil roast; how an industrial juicer pours out massive amounts of creamy mango smoothies; the secret chemistry behind full fat bocconcini cheese; and how vegan brownies can be healthy and sinfully delicious.

programme.title: Food Factory S4 Ep1
programme.desc: See the secrets of the ice cream served like a cake, or the production of tangy tartar sauce, and a machine called the "encruster" that makes a single batch of 2,700 bite-size cake pops.

programme.title: Lion: The Rise and Fall of the Marsh Pride S1 Ep1
programme.desc: The Marsh Pride of lions have lived for generations in Kenya's famous Maasai Mara Reserve. The pride's history is a tale of shifting loyalties, bloody take overs and sheer resilience. programme.title: Food Factory S1 Ep9
programme.desc: Discover how the world's best spuds make it to the dinner plate; why gumballs travel through the twilight zone to become perfectly shaped; just how far hot chocolate has come since the Aztecs invented it; and the secret to recreating finger lickin' barbecue ribs at home.

programme.title: Food Factory S1 Ep10
programme.desc: Discover how cool coils are essential to the tastiest cold smoked salmon; how special cups give a new spin to age-old yogurt; how 1000 kg of delicious ravioli are made daily; and how making three million pounds of crispy fresh salad can actually be easy.

programme.title: Eden: Untamed Planet S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Galapagos: Enchanted Isles - Discovering how the Galapagos became one of the most important areas of biodiversity in the world.

programme.title: Japan with Sue Perkins S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Sue Perkins starts her journey in Tokyo, home to 36 million people. She trains with a female sumo wrestling team and meets a family who live with robots.

programme.title: Ben Fogle: Return to the Wild S3 Ep6
programme.desc: Bulgaria - Ben Fogle returns to Bulgaria to meet up with nomads Miriam and Peter after four years.

programme.title: Extreme Fishing with Robson Green S2 Ep1
programme.desc: British Columbia, Canada - Robson heads out on the Fraser River to find Canada's largest game fish; the mighty sturgeon, which can reach weights of 1000 lbs and lengths of 12ft.

programme.title: Animals Like Us 1 - Pirate Birds Ep4
programme.desc: Go rogue with frigate birds, who steal meals from smaller seabirds; relax in a mongoose-run spa with a grateful warthog; and decode an African elephants secret message. Then watch lovelorn capuchin monkeys hurl rocks to attract prospective mates.

programme.title: Animals Like Us 1 - Lion Daycare Ep5
programme.desc: Discover why it takes a village to raise lion cubs in Kenya and sniff out the mating strategy of fragrant lemurs in Madagascar. Cut a rug at a honeybee dance party, then listen up as a forked-tailed drongo tricks other birds out of their dinner.

programme.title: Animals Like Us 1 - Shark Dentist Ep6
programme.desc: Marvel at the toothy fish that help sharks maintain their pearly whites and discover the signature calls of dolphin families. Examine capuchin monkeys nut-cracking stone tools, get the warm fuzzies when giraffes snuggle, and meet a meerkat mobster.

programme.title: My Best Friend's An Animal 1 - Toto, Banksi, and Lucy Ep4
programme.desc: Flap around with Banksi the fruit bat and his human surrogate mom, eye a mischievous emu, and celebrate a pigs rescue-versary. Tour manatee heaven and learn to speak baboon with Dingani, who has a one-of-a-kind kinship with his primate pal Lucy.

programme.title: My Best Friend's An Animal 1 - Penny, Chunk, and Faith Ep5
programme.desc: Visit Penny the pigeon and the human who saved her, get a buzz from a refugee who found comfort in beekeeping, and see celebrity groundhogs. Dive with a shark dancer and feel touched by the deep, lifelong commitment Riana has to Faith the cheetah.

programme.title: Strange Creatures 2 - Ocean Oddballs Ep3
programme.desc: Dive into the lives of the oceans weirdest animals. Looking into a whitemargin stargazer fishs eyes can be a shocking experience (literally), while predators hoping to take down a peacock mantis shrimp will be stopped by its vice-like claws.

programme.title: Undiscovered Vistas 1 - Utah Ep4
programme.desc: A diverse trek through the remote and surprising canyonlands of southern Utah reveals soaring cliff walls, forested plateaus, and breathtaking gorges. Snow-capped mountains ring natural bridges, arches, and stunning rock formations eroded by time.

programme.title: Undiscovered Vistas 1 - Arizona Ep5
programme.desc: Epic natural wonders are uncovered in the remote desert of the American southwest. From sweeping canyons bound by towering cliffs to fossilized dunes striped in desert red, the Paria Plateau is a geological marvel.

programme.title: Animals Like Us 1 - Meerkat Survival School Ep3
programme.desc: Learn how to disarm and dine on scorpions with meerkat pups in the Kalahari Desert and review a lioness flirting strategy in Kenya. Meet same-sex penguin couples who are raising chicks together, then sign up for an Asian elephant babysitters club.

programme.title: Animals Like Us 1 - Pirate Birds Ep4
programme.desc: Go rogue with frigate birds, who steal meals from smaller seabirds; relax in a mongoose-run spa with a grateful warthog; and decode an African elephants secret message. Then watch lovelorn capuchin monkeys hurl rocks to attract prospective mates.

programme.title: Great Parks of Africa 1 - Chobe National Park: Land of Learning Ep6
programme.desc: In the north of Botswana there is a haven where the Chobe River provides a lifeline for wildlife, but in the dry season many animals face a daily battle with the fierce heat, Including three of Africas most iconic families: lions, elephants and baboons. Though they may be vastly different, they all have the same goal: to raise their young.

programme.title: Ol Pejeta Diaries 1 - Africa Titans Ep1
programme.desc: The death of a wild black rhino after a fight with another dominant male, and a 14-year-old blind black rhino becomes the new ambassador for the species.

programme.title: Animals Like Us 1 - Meerkat Survival School Ep3

programme.title: Strange Creatures 2 - Anatomy Gone Wild Ep4
programme.desc: Evolution has granted some animals a distinct advantage over their opponents. Investigate the perfect body-part mutations that have given wunderpus octopuses, axolotls, royal spoonbills, aye-ayes, and other creatures an edge.

programme.title: Ol Pejeta Diaries 1 - Refugees of Laikipia Ep2
programme.desc: The mass relocation of an endangered species of Hartebeest from a game reserve to Ol Pejeta, so the land can be resettled by refugees.

programme.title: Africa's Underwater Wonders 1 - The Dune Kingdoms Ep1
programme.desc: Just off the east coast of South Africa, lie two different worlds. One is a stage for the bold and the beautiful. While in the other, ambush and camouflage reign. Both are home to a vast array of life, from ancient residents to ocean wanderers. These are the Dune Kingdoms of Aliwal and Sodwana.

programme.title: Kalahari: Land of Secret Alliances 1 - Pushed to the Limits Ep2
programme.desc: Thirst for rain alongside the animals of the Kalahari, as they endure a brutally dry year. Witness co-operation between elephant herds in their desperate search for water and meet a meerkats strange babysitter, who helps the next generation survive.

programme.title: Chasing the Rains 1 - Blood and Dust Ep2
programme.desc: Discover the clever way elephants dig wells, and see the relief that comes with a sudden river-filling downpour. Mourn cheetah Kuletas loss after lions kill one of her cubs, and get a front-row seat when wild dog Phoenix faces off with a hyena mob.

programme.title: Animals Like Us 1 - Pirate Birds Ep4
programme.desc: Go rogue with frigate birds, who steal meals from smaller seabirds; relax in a mongoose-run spa with a grateful warthog; and decode an African elephants secret message. Then watch lovelorn capuchin monkeys hurl rocks to attract prospective mates.

programme.title: Dawn to Dusk 1 - Hot Day in the New World Ep1
programme.desc: Follow penguins, iguanas, tortoises, frogs and tamarins from Mexico to Peru, and as far west as the Galapagos Islands, as they live out their daily dramas, affected by the suns heat, looming predators and hazardous weather conditions.

programme.title: Dawn to Dusk 1 - Asia's Longest Day Ep2
programme.desc: See how creatures from the Tibetan plateau, to the lush rainforests of Thailand, to Vietnams twisted mangroves, survive four extra hours of daylight once a year, searching for food, fighting for dominance and raising their families.

programme.title: Strange Creatures 2 - Giant Creepy Crawlers Ep5
programme.desc: Crawl along with some of the worlds fiercest insects. Watch as giant cockroaches build their immune systems to ensure long life. Then check out the toxic prowess of giant millipedes and the invisibility cloaks of giant prickly stick insects.

programme.title: Ol Pejeta Diaries 1 - White Rhinos of Enasoit Ep3
programme.desc: The conservation team attempts to move two white rhinos to Ol Pejeta from the nearby Enasoit ranch after it is discovered that poachers have been watching the animals.

programme.title: Africa's Underwater Wonders 1 - Cape Fur Seals Ep2
programme.desc: On South Africas west coast, Cape fur seals form huge breeding colonies and reproduce. For pups that cant swim, its a challenging start to life as they battle heat, hunger, congestion and ocean storms. Those that survive will take to the water and join the multitude of creatures that surround them.

programme.title: Kalahari: Land of Secret Alliances 1 - Behind the Lens Ep3
programme.desc: Track scientists who have arrived in the Kalahari to test a hypothesis: that animal collaboration is the key to the dizzying diversity of the regions species. Observe as they monitor behavior, decipher data, and deliver fascinating conclusions.

programme.title: Chasing the Rains 1 - Praying for Rain Ep3
programme.desc: Trail Anastasia as her herd splits to protect two precious elephant calves, while Kuleta retakes territory for her remaining cheetah cubs. Join wild dog Phoenixs search for a new mate as the skies open up and rain begins to heal the parched land.

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots Ep66
programme.desc: Fifi Misses Me Not - Bumble has gone off on a pollen collecting expedition. He wishes Fifi was with him. Meanwhile, back in the garden, Fifi is missing her best friend too.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep14
programme.desc: The Case Of The Toyland Accidents - Something strange is happening in Toyland trees are falling down and machines are going crazy. What's going on? Noddy needs to use all his investigating skills to find out who is causing all the accidents before someone gets hurt. He realises that Deltoid is trying to help and be a superhero but hasn't realised that his superstrength is causing chaos! Noddy shows him how to be a super helpful superhero without causing anymore accidents! Well done Noddy!

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots Ep53
programme.desc: Compost Chaos - Primrose can't make her garden grow and turns to Fifi for advice. She is amazed when Fifi points out that you need to water and weed a garden. And surely she can't really mean putting that yucky compost everywhere can she?

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep1
programme.desc: Case Of The Broken Crystal Memory Game - All the toys are ready to start the exciting DareDale Challenge race, which culminates in the competitors successfully completing the Crystal Memory Game in the DareDale Caves. Before the race can start everyone is disappointed to discover that the Crystal Memory Game has been broken. Whilst Clockwork Mouse gets the game mended, Noddy must investigate who broke the game so that they don't break it again. Using his investigating skills in questioning, gathering evidence on the WhoWhatWhere Tablet and thinking, Noddy discovers that Deltoid accidentally broke the game when he was trying to memorise the crystal sorting sequence. Clever Noddy helps Deltoid remember the sequence by remembering the shapes and they are able to finish the game together. Case Closed!

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car Ep1
programme.desc: Flash The Marshall - Mr Carburettor is going to ban Flash from Silver hatch unless he learns how to do something useful. Can Flash learn how to be a good marshal in time?

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car Ep2
programme.desc: Hellie's A Winner - Hellie wants to be able to race like the cars. When he does join in he is accused of cheating. Hellie is upset and the cars annoyed will they be able to make up before something disastrous happens?

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep1
programme.desc: Why Elephant Has A Trunk - You see there was a time when Elephant had no nose. He couldn't swat away the flies, or scrub his belly he couldn't even blow his nose. Then one day snappy Crocodile snapped! Crocodile pulled and he pulled and he pulled until Ker-doing!!! Crocodile let go and Elephant's nose was all long and wiggly! And that's why Elephant has a trunk. Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep2
programme.desc: Why Snake Has No Legs - You see there was a time when Snake did have legs hundreds and hundreds of them. But poor old Snake had no eyes, not a single eye on his head. Then on the day of the great Tinga Tinga Festival of Colours Snake quite literally bumped into Millipede who was stuck in a hole. They decided to swap eyes and legs just for one day. So that Snake could see all the wonderful colours and Millipede could run all over Tinga Tinga. But when Snake came back to return Millipede's eyes, Millepede couldn't be found anywhere! So to this day, Snake has no legs. Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go Ep9
programme.desc: Lost and Found / In the Park In the Dark - The Community Center's Lost and Found is full and it's up to the gang to use their detective skills and return the lost items to their original owners. / Rodney only needs one more bird on his birdwatching list, but the only problem is that it only comes out at night! Team Zenko must help Rodney face his fear of the dark so he can get the last picture for his collection.

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go! Ep5

Kelp goes to his Dad for answers, and two seemingly different ingredients form something magical. / When Cruz is not his usual upbeat self, Kelp tries various ways to cheer him up before realizing the best way to be a good friend is to just sit with him, and let him feel what hes feeling.

programme.title: Dew Drops Diaries Ep5

programme.desc: Driven to Distraction / To Bee or Not To Bee - When easily-distracted Luis is tasked with getting flowers for his grandmother's birthday party, TZG secretly keeps him on track. / When Rodney's honey bees escape from their apiary (artificial beehive), TZG secretly brings them back.

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go! Ep4

Eventually he realises that Smartysaurus borrowed the game so that she could practise the Toy Twist but it's no good! She still can't master it! Noddy shows her how her own special Dinosaur Dance can make everyone's Toy Twist extra specially fun! Well done Noddy!
