programme.desc: Shake, Rattle and Bang - Madame Gazelle gives the class a music lesson. There's lots of crashing and banging at first, but it's not long before the grown-ups visit and lay down some notes of their own.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S4 Ep417
programme.desc: Champion Daddy Pig - Daddy Pig loses his title as Champion Puddle Jumper during the Daddi-Olympics, so everyone helps him train to win it back at the Daddi-Olympics.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S4 Ep418
programme.desc: Chatterbox - Peppa Pig talks far too much. Or at least so Suzy thinks. In response, Peppa decides that she is never going to talk, ever again. But this does not last for very long at all.

programme.title: Anna & Friends S1 Ep124
programme.desc: A Present for Ron - Christopher loves Ron's rock collection so much, he wants to add another beautiful rock to it! They set off on a journey to find the most amazing rock they can find. When they discover it - they must figure out a creative solution to get it to Ron!

programme.title: Anna & Friends S1 Ep125
programme.desc: The Trip to the Moon - Christopher dreams to visit the moon so his friends make his wish come true. Bubu makes a rocket ship in cardboard and the friends make Christopher an outfit with everything he will need during the trip to the moon.

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show S1 Ep105
programme.desc: Cranberry Cookies / Snap Pea Stir-Fry - Tiny Chef bakes cookies to welcome a lady bug who moves into the neighborhood. // Tiny Chef makes snap pea stir fry and learns that his friends are good kitchen helpers when he has trouble cooking on his own.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S3 Ep303
programme.desc: Paddington And The Three Musketeers / Paddington And The Dinosaur Hunt - It's World Book Day and Paddington helps Mateo discover his favorite character to dress up as. // Paddington, Simi and Jonathan are on a dinosaur hunt on the island in the park, but dinosaurs don't exist any more, do they?

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S3 Ep307
programme.desc: Paddington's Life Guard Training - Paddington, Jonathan and Judy become trainee lifeguards and end up rescuing Mr Brown with Taylor the lifeguard's help.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S4 Ep414
programme.desc: Officer Blaze - Blaze and AJ are joining the police department! With the help of their new police pal, Officer Anna, Blaze transforms into a super-fast police car to lend a helping hand (or tire) to any truck in trouble.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S8 Ep817
programme.desc: Pups Save a Box Fort / Pups Save Travelin' Travis From Really Big Bill! - The Pups must save Rocky and Humdinger from a runaway box fort. // When Skye helps Traveling Travis search for Big Bill Island, the misguided explorer gets carried away by a really, really big bird.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S8 Ep821
programme.desc: Dancing with Luke Stars! / Pups Save a Mischievous Octopus - A dance contest being judged by Luke Stars goes wrong when a floating dancefloor carries the contestants away. // The pups investigate a mystery at an undersea-themed museum exhibit and discover an octopus that wants to return to the ocean

programme.title: PAW Patrol S6 Ep626
programme.desc: Pups Save Midnight at the Museum - A fun museum sleepover is interrupted when Alex and the mini-patrol go missing, and Mayor Goodway gets stranded on a T-Rex!

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S1 Ep126
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Treehouse / The Crew Builds A Chicken Feeder - Park Ranger Rose's favorite tree might be off limits for climbing unless Rubble and Grandpa can come up with a solution. / The Crew build a feeder for Farmer Zoe's chickens, but when they get loose, it's up to the pups to safely rescue them.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S1 Ep101
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Bridge - Rubble and his construction pup family gear up to build a bridge, only to find the villainous Speed Meister has a different idea. It's up to Rubble & Crew to work together and save the day by building a new, safe bridge to Builder Cove.

programme.title: DORA S1 Ep104
programme.desc: Big Red Chicken Wake Up! / The Mystery Gift - Dora and Boots have to wake up the Big Red Chicken before he floats over a waterfall! // Dora and friends must solve a series of questions and challenges to open a mysterious gift.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S1 Ep110
programme.desc: Shadowland / Medievel Tides - Jealous of Baby Shark's popularity, Shadow rebrands the Wreck as his own personal amusement park. // When Baby Shark and friends are playing knights and royals, Vola wants to be more than just a princess.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S1 Ep109
programme.desc: Captain Kelp / Teensy the Tardigrade - As Super Shark and Captain Kelp, Baby Shark and William set out to save playtime-but is Captain Kelp just a sidekick? // Baby Shark adopts a teensy tiny pet, but is he ready for a big responsibility?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S4 Ep419
programme.desc: Mr Fox's Van - When Daddy Pig needs a new watch, Mr Fox finds three grandfather clocks in the back of his van. Three clocks are much better than one. Mr Fox has everything in his van even a chicken!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S4 Ep420
programme.desc: Chloe's Big Friends - Peppa and George go to play with Cousin Chloe and her friends, but the older children don't want to play any "baby" games.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S4 Ep421
programme.desc: Gym Class - Madame Gazelle takes the children to Grampy Rabbit's gym class, where at first they think all the stuff to do is scary, but Grampy Rabbit tells the kids about how he explored a jungle, helping the kids get over their fears.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S4 Ep422
programme.desc: The Blackberry Bush - Peppa and her family collect apples and blackberries in Granny and Grandpa Pig's garden to make a pie.

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show S1 Ep108
programme.desc: Mac and Cheese / Potato Stew - Tiny Chef makes rainy day Mac N Cheese but a leaky roof creates chaos in his tree stump kitchen! // Tiny Chef cooks pirate potato stew and uses a treasure map to find the special ingredient

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S2 Ep201
programme.desc: Moving Mission / Barbabright's Invention - During a walk, the Barbapapa family discovers a megalith. // Barbabright has a stroke of genius: the invention of the "BAM".

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S2 Ep202
programme.desc: Princess For A Day / Barbabeau's Adventure - Barbabelle proudly announces to her family that she wants to become a princess. // Barbabravo is moping with boredom, his brothers and sisters are all busy and no one wants to play with him.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S7 Ep703
programme.desc: The Super Skateboard - It's Grammy's birthday but Crusher doesn't have enough money for a special gift! So, Blaze and AJ help him do different jobs and earn the money for Grammy's present. But, they have to hurry so they can be back in time for Grammy's birthday party!

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S7 Ep704
programme.desc: Knights in Sparkling Armor - When Crusher and Pickle are trapped inside a cage over a bubbling slime swap, it's up to Blaze, AJ, and Sparkle to become...Knights! Will they be able to rescue Crusher and Pickle from the swamp before it's too late?

programme.title: PAW Patrol S8 Ep822
programme.desc: Pups Save the Kitties and the Kiddies / Pups Save the Green House - Mayor Humdinger babysits his new friend's children, but trouble arises when they start feuding with his kitties. // When Mayor Goodway and Mayor Humdinger gets accidentally locked in a greenhouse and need rescued from an exotic plant inside.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S8 Ep823
programme.desc: Pups Save the Floating Goodways / Pups Save the Portable Pet Wash - The Goodways drift out to sea on a swan shaped float and need rescued from a flock of real swans aiming to protect the giant inflatable. // Mayor Humdinger steals Katie's Portable Pet Wash and ends up causing bubble trouble all over town.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S1 Ep109
programme.desc: Captain Kelp / Teensy the Tardigrade - As Super Shark and Captain Kelp, Baby Shark and William set out to save playtime-but is Captain Kelp just a sidekick? // Baby Shark adopts a teensy tiny pet, but is he ready for a big responsibility?

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S1 Ep121
programme.desc: Shark Prank - Baby and William have to think outside the box in order to prank the ultimate prank master... Grandma Shark.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S1 Ep111
programme.desc: The Grass is Always Greener... / When I Grow Up - Barbabright coats the house in magic product to prevent water leakage. The next day, The house deflates like a balloon. // A bird builds its nest on Barbazoo's belly. Barbazoo wants to become a big tree to shelter animals. This becomes complicated.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S3 Ep304
programme.desc: Paddington's Journey Into A Black Hole/ Paddington's Rainbow Race - When things go missing in Windsor Gardens Jonathan believes a black hole is to blame, so Paddington goes on a space mission. // Simi and Paddington try to find the gold at the end of a rainbow after they break Baaz's kaleidoscope.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S1 Ep103
programme.desc: The Crew Builds An Ice Cream Shop / The Crew Fixes A Squeak - When a windy day derails construction on an ice cream shop, Rubble, Mix, Wheeler, and Charger are on the chase. // There's a mysterious squeak in City Hall. Mayor Greatway asks Rubble and Charger to find and fix the squeak before her big speech!

programme.title: DORA S1 Ep109
programme.desc: Tres Leches Trouble / Wizzle Wozzle Woo - Dora, Boots, and Benny have to trek through the rainforest to deliver a big, delicate tres leches cake to Benny's abuela. //Dora and the Fiesta Trio investigate a loud, strange noise that caused them to lose their instruments.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S7 Ep705
programme.desc: Paramedic Power - When Blaze's friends need help, Ambulance Blaze, Paramedic AJ and Paramedic Gabby have all the tools they need to save the day!

programme.title: Deer Squad S3 Ep320
programme.desc: Hide And Sea / Mountain Of Fun - The Twins holds a birthday party in the Deep Deer Diver. Trouble follows when the Twins hide in one of the Aquapods. // The twins have a super fun day when Trickalien turns Frost Mountain into a bob sleigh ride. But things soon slide out of control.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S2 Ep223
programme.desc: Funny Fish / Club Cool - Goldie embraces her serious side to impress a director from Chomp City. // Everyfishy wants to join Shadow's cool new club.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S2 Ep224
programme.desc: FLOWMO / Fishy Scouts - When all the other fishies are out of town during winter vacation, Baby and William create their very own fin-credible day of friendship. // Chucks takes a unique approach to camping on his first trip with the Fishy Scouts.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S8 Ep824
programme.desc: Pups Save a Lonesome Walrus / Pups Save the Hummy Gummies - Wally the Walrus searches all over Adventure Bay for Cap'n Turbot and turns the town upside-down in the process. // Everybody loves Helga Humdinger's Hummy Gummy treats, causing Mayor Humdinger to get jealous and steal them all.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S4 Ep408
programme.desc: Pups Save the Flying Food - Mr. Porter's delivery drones have gone out of control, and now they are air-dropping food everywhere!

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S1 Ep104
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Playground / The Crew Fixes A Roof - After Speed Meister builds an unsafe playground, the Rubble & Crew get creative and build a whole new one with old materials. // The town Chili Cookaroo is threatened when City Hall's roof starts to cave in! Luckily, the pups know just how to fix it.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S1 Ep126
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Chicken Feeder - The Crew build a feeder for Farmer Zoe's chickens, but when they get loose, it's up to the pups to safely rescue them.

programme.title: Siaran Langsung: Salam Baitullah (Khas Malam Raya)
programme.desc: Salam Baitullah, sebuah rancangan tonggak RTM bersiaran setiap kali musim haji kembali menemui penonton bermula 2 Jun hingga 17 Jun ini. Musim ke-16 menjanjikan suatu keistimewaan apabila buat julung kalinya Salam Baitullah akan bersiaran di luar Angkasapuri iaitu di Masjid Putra, Putrajaya. Bertemakan Kemuncak Ibadah, Suatu Ibrah, menampilkan pengacara Ustaz Don Daniyal Don Biyajid, Ustaz Fakrul Razi (UNIC), Farah Diana Anuar dan Imam Muda Megat Mohd Zaid. Penonton setia Salam Baitullah turut berpeluang memenangi hadiah-hadiah menarik dalam kuiz terkumpul, kuiz harian dan kuiz media sosial.

programme.title: Destinasi Saudi Bersama Chef Alwi Ep1
programme.desc: Episod kali ini, Chef alwi bersama isteri, seorang muallaf iaitu Dato' Nurul Cynthia William dan rakan-rakannya menunaikan umrah ziarah dengan Pakej Team Safar Buddies. Mereka bertolak dari Kuala Lumpur ke Dubai dan ke Jeddah menaiki kapal terbang dan ke Taif menaiki bas. Di Taif, mereka berpeluang ke Tanah Tinggi Al-Haddad, Toboggan, dan Ladang Ros Al-Qurashi dan melakukan aktiviti di sana.

programme.title: Destinasi Saudi Bersama Chef Alwi Ep2
programme.desc: Episod kali ini, Chef Alwi Mahfodz bersama isteri, seorang muallaf iaitu Dato' Nurul Cynthia William dan rakan-rakannya menunaikan umrah dan mereka berkongsi keadaan semasa melakukan tawaf. Chef Alwi Mahfodz juga memberi tahu tentang Hotel Makkah Al-Naseem dan melawat Jabal Nur.

programme.title: HER Women in Asia
programme.desc: Single mom- Being a single mom is an everyday battle for many women. Financial stress, the lack of support or social isolation are just a few of the problems single moms face. In some Asian countries, single mothers continue to face heavy stigmatism. But one-parent families have been on the rise, due to increasing divorce rates, parental migration, and children born to single women.

programme.title: LIVE: UFC Fight Night: Perez vs. Taira
programme.desc: Main Event - Japanese sensation Tatsuro Taira puts his perfect record on the line in his first UFC main event on June 16, as he faces perennial flyweight contender Alex Perez at the APEX in Las Vegas. The UFC Fight Night headliner features the surging Perez, who is fresh off a stirring knockout win over Matheus Nicolau, against a 24-year-old rising star from Okinawa who has soared into the rankings on the strength of five Octagon victories without a loss.

programme.title: Mencari Ramli Musim Ke - 4 Ep11
programme.desc: Program pencarian bakat bola sepak yang hebat diteruskan lagi dengan Musim Ke-4. Program ini memberi peluang kepada bakat muda untuk merealisasikan impian mereka menjadi pemain bola sepak terbaik di peringkat kebangsaan dan antarabangsa. Program ini mencungkil bakat bola sepak anak-anak muda berusia bawah 14 tahun dan bawah 16 tahun.

programme.title: Sensasi Bola Ep10
programme.desc: Sensasi Bola merupakan satu program bual bicara berdurasi setengah jam bersama pemain bola sepak, selebriti, jurulatih dan peminat sebagai tetamu undangan setiap minggu. Antara topik menarik yang akan dikupas adalah isu mengenai bola sepak tempatan dan antarabangsa, temubual ekslusif bersama lagenda bola sepak, tips kesihatan serta isu semasa yang menjadi perbualan masa kini.

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Cannonier vs. Imavov
programme.desc: Prelims - The Octagon returns to Louisville, Kentucky for the first time since 2011 on June 9, and the UFC Fight Night main event at KFC Yum! Center will be one to remember, as middleweight contenders Jared Cannonier and Nassourdine Imavov clash in a bout expected to shake up the 185-pound Top 10. A former world title challenger, the hard-hitting Cannonier is coming off back to back wins over Sean Strickland and Marvin Vettori, moving him closer to another shot at the belt should he defeat Frances Imavov, who owns wins over Edmen Shabazyan, Joaquin Buckley and Roman Dolidze.

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Cannonier vs. Imavov
programme.desc: Prelims - The Octagon returns to Louisville, Kentucky for the first time since 2011 on June 9, and the UFC Fight Night main event at KFC Yum! Center will be one to remember, as middleweight contenders Jared Cannonier and Nassourdine Imavov clash in a bout expected to shake up the 185-pound Top 10. A former world title challenger, the hard-hitting Cannonier is coming off back to back wins over Sean Strickland and Marvin Vettori, moving him closer to another shot at the belt should he defeat Frances Imavov, who owns wins over Edmen Shabazyan, Joaquin Buckley and Roman Dolidze.
